word:
Those who make it their rule of life to serve and honor God will give heed to the apostle's injunction, "Whether ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God." Such students will preserve their integrity in the face of temptation, and will come from school with well-developed 
                                                                           76
intellects, and with health of body and health of soul.--Signs of the Times, June 29, 1882.
